statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 AND email = 'john@example.com';
DELETE FROM users WHERE username = 'alice' AND password = 'secure123';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE receiver_id = 10 AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE receiver_id = 100 AND amount > 500;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE balance < 100.00 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%');
